column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Everytime I get my haircut , I have terrible anxiety .
#id=2
#text=I got a really really bad haircut once and never got over it .
#id=3
#text=When I get a haircut , first I research different haircuts and styles that I might like and compile a bunch that I like .
#id=4
#text=Then I make my appointment with a trusted hairstylist .
#id=5
#text=The day of I drive to the hair salon and give my name .
#id=6
#text=I wait while for a bit and then they bring me to the back to wash my hair .
#id=7
#text=Once done , I see the hair stylist and I show her my pictures .
#id=8
#text=While she brushes out my washed hair , we make a decision as to what cut and style will look best on me .
#id=9
#text=Then she gets to cutting my hair .
#text=Once she is done cutting , she dries and styles my hair and checks that it is to my liking .
#text=Small change are made , and then I tip her , pay my bill , and go home .
